answers.answer: Hi!Arm pain in deltoid area can be due to injury, irritation, or inflammation of muscles, ligaments, tendons, bones and joints. So it could be shoulder pain or elbow pain referred to deltoid region or it can be muscle injury.Since pain is present on both sides it can be due to pinched cervical spinal nerves, diabetes or hypothyroidism.It can also be due to Scalene Myofascial Pain Syndrome, clots in deep veins, inflammation of veins or lymphatics. Do discuss this with your doctor and get yourself examined. Take care!

question: I have been having pain(like the pain after recieving a shot) in both right and left deltoid musceles for the past few months and the pain is getting worse sometimes I can not lift my arms upward or downward I have to keep them midline my body
